name: Adelaide_Tagge
content:
Adelaide Tagge was a human female member of the House of Tagge who served as one of the Tagge Corporation's two Heads of Finance during the Galactic Civil War. The other Head of Finance was Felix Tagge, who referred to Adelaide as "dear." Adelaide was the cousin of Domina Tagge, the leader of the Tagge Corporation.
Adelaide Tagge first appeared via imagination in the fifth issue of the 2020 comic series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra . She first appeared in-person and was first identified in the 2021 comic War of the Bounty Hunters â€“ Boushh 1. Doctor Aphra  author Alyssa Wong has stated on Twitter that Adelaide and Felix Tagge were the parents of Ronen Tagge, though no canon source has confirmed this.
